languages.text: "Свидетельствовать клятве благословенного Ангела Его — великий дар. Свидетельствовать клятве неизбывного мщения — величайший".
languages.translation_comment:
Speaker Kibellah
Ulfar: "I will find out who condemned my brothers to death, and I will bring them a harsh reckoning! I swear it!"

languages.text: "To bear witness to an oath of His blessed Angel is a great gift. To bear witness to an oath of inescapable vengeance is the greatest gift of all."
languages.original_text: "Свидетельствовать клятве благословенного Ангела Его — великий дар. Свидетельствовать клятве неизбывного мщения — величайший".

traits.locale_text: "To bear witness to an oath of His blessed Angel is a great gift. To bear witness to an oath of unutterable vengeance is the greatest gift of all."
"To bear witness to an oath of His blessed Angel is a great gift. To bear witness to an oath of unutterable vengeance is the greatest gift of all."

"To bear witness to an oath of His blessed Angel is a great gift. To bear witness to an oath of inescapable vengeance is the greatest gift of all."
"To bear witness to an oath of His blessed Angel is a great gift. To bear witness to an oath of inescapable vengeance is the greatest gift of all."

languages.text: "Zeuge eines Schwurs seines gesegneten Engels zu werden, ist ein großes Geschenk. Zeuge eines Schwurs der unausweichlichen Vergeltung zu werden, ist das größte Geschenk überhaupt."
languages.original_text: "To bear witness to an oath of His blessed Angel is a great gift. To bear witness to an oath of inescapable vengeance is the greatest gift of all."

traits.locale_text: "Zeuge eines Schwurs seines gesegneten Engels zu werden, ist ein großes Geschenk. Zeuge eines Schwurs der unausweichlichen Vergeltung zu werden, ist das größte Geschenk überhaupt."

languages.text: « Être témoin d'un serment prêté par Son ange béni est un grand privilège. Être témoin d'un serment de vengeance implacable est le plus grand des privilèges. »
languages.original_text: "To bear witness to an oath of His blessed Angel is a great gift. To bear witness to an oath of inescapable vengeance is the greatest gift of all."

traits.locale_text: « Être témoin d'un serment prêté par Son ange béni est un grand privilège. Être témoin d'un serment de vengeance implacable est le plus grand des privilèges. »

languages.text: «Ser testigo de un juramento de Su Ángel es un gran don. Ser testigo de un juramento de venganza ineludible es el mayor don de todos».
languages.original_text: "To bear witness to an oath of His blessed Angel is a great gift. To bear witness to an oath of inescapable vengeance is the greatest gift of all."

traits.locale_text: «Ser testigo de un juramento de Su Ángel es un gran don. Ser testigo de un juramento de venganza ineludible es el mayor don de todos».

languages.text: 「祝福された天使の誓いを目撃することは、偉大な贈り物である。逃れられない復讐の誓いの証人となることは、この上なく偉大な贈り物である」
languages.original_text: "To bear witness to an oath of His blessed Angel is a great gift. To bear witness to an oath of inescapable vengeance is the greatest gift of all."

traits.locale_text: 「祝福された天使の誓いを目撃することは、偉大な贈り物である。逃れられない復讐の誓いの証人となることは、この上なく偉大な贈り物である」

languages.text: “能亲眼见到祂的天使许下誓言，这是件伟大的礼物，而能亲眼见证必将实现的复仇，这是最美妙的礼物。”
languages.original_text: "To bear witness to an oath of His blessed Angel is a great gift. To bear witness to an oath of inescapable vengeance is the greatest gift of all."

traits.locale_text: “能亲眼见到祂的天使许下誓言，这是件伟大的礼物，而能亲眼见证必将实现的复仇，这是最美妙的礼物。”

languages.original_text: "To bear witness to an oath of His blessed Angel is a great gift. To bear witness to an oath of inescapable vengeance is the greatest gift of all."

languages.text: "O'nun Meleği'nin yeminine şahit olmak, yüce bir armağandır. Kaçınılmaz bir intikamın yeminine şahit olmak ise olabilecek en yüce bir armağandır."
languages.original_text: "To bear witness to an oath of His blessed Angel is a great gift. To bear witness to an oath of inescapable vengeance is the greatest gift of all."
